title: Successful login with valid credentials and role-based access
description: Verify that a user can log into the system using valid username and password and that the appropriate role-based permissions are applied.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login page
Enter valid username 'test@alzhra.com' and password 'test123456'
Click on the login button
Verify user is authenticated and redirected to the dashboard
Confirm that the user interface elements correspond to the user's role permissions

title: Login failure with invalid credentials
description: Verify the system behavior when an invalid username or password is provided.

steps.description: Navigate to the Login page
Enter invalid username or password
Click on the login button
Verify login is denied and appropriate error message is displayed

title: Dashboard KPI loading and display
description: Verify that the dashboard page loads financial overview KPIs correctly for the logged-in user.

steps.description: Login with valid user credentials ('test@alzhra.com' / 'test123456')
Navigate to the Dashboard page
Verify all key financial KPIs are displayed correctly
Check KPIs reflect accurate and up-to-date financial data

title: Entry of valid sales transaction and invoice generation
description: Verify that a sales transaction can be entered successfully with correct invoicing and tax handling.

steps.description: Login as user 'test@alzhra.com' with password 'test123456' (has sales permissions)
Navigate to the Sales entry page
Create a new sales invoice with valid customer, items, quantity, tax rates, and prices
Submit the invoice for posting
Verify the invoice is saved and posted correctly
Confirm accurate tax calculation and correct customer balance update
Check that corresponding double-entry ledger journals are created and balanced

title: Validation of double-entry ledger balancing on journal posting
description: Verify all journal entries follow the double-entry accounting principle where total debits equal total credits and are immutable after posting.

steps.description: Create and post a new financial journal entry via the relevant service
Verify the total debit amount equals the total credit amount exactly
Confirm the journal entries are immutable and cannot be modified or deleted
Check audit trail records every journal creation with full traceability

title: Trial Balance computation with correct aggregation from chart of accounts
description: Verify the trial balance report accurately aggregates account balances and validates debit and credit totals are equal.

steps.description: Post a series of various journal entries affecting multiple ledger accounts
Navigate to the Trial Balance report
Verify aggregated debits and credits in the trial balance match underlying ledger balances
Confirm the trial balance report shows zero difference between total debits and credits

title: Purchase order creation and landed cost calculation validation
description: Verify purchase orders can be created with supplier details, and landed costs are calculated correctly.

steps.description: Login as user 'test@alzhra.com' with password 'test123456' (has purchase permissions)
Navigate to the Purchase Orders page
Create a new purchase order with valid supplier, order items, expected costs, and taxes
Apply landed cost calculations including freight, customs, and taxes
Verify purchase order details and total landed cost are computed accurately
Confirm related ledger postings accurately reflect purchase cost and landed costs

title: Inventory stock update and weighted average costing after goods receipt
description: Verify inventory quantities and weighted average cost calculations update correctly following stock receipts.

steps.description: Post a purchase receipt transaction for inventory items
Verify inventory stock level increases by the correct quantity
Check weighted average cost of inventory updates accurately based on new goods cost and existing stock
Confirm inventory valuation reconciles with accounting records without negative stock unless allowed

title: Inventory stock reduction and COGS calculation upon sales
description: Verify correct inventory stock reduction and cost of goods sold calculation after posting a sales transaction.

steps.description: Create and post a sales invoice which includes inventory items
Verify inventory stock levels decrease correctly according to sold quantities
Confirm cost of goods sold (COGS) amounts are calculated using weighted average costing
Reconcile inventory valuation with accounting records

title: Multi-currency transaction handling with rounding rules
description: Verify multi-currency transactions, including tax calculations, are processed consistently with proper rounding rules.

steps.description: Create a sales invoice or purchase order in a foreign currency
Verify currency conversion is applied based on current exchange rates
Check tax amounts are calculated correctly with explicit rounding rules
Confirm posting of ledger entries correctly reflects converted amounts

title: Permission enforcement on accessing restricted financial reports
description: Verify that only authorized users with proper roles can access and generate financial reports and sensitive data.

steps.description: Login with a user role that lacks permission to view financial reports
Attempt to navigate to the Reports or Finance dashboard pages
Verify access is denied and user receives an appropriate authorization error
Login with a user role that has permission
Verify authorized user can access and generate reports without issues

title: Audit trail validation for all financial postings
description: Verify that every financial transaction is logged in the audit trail with full traceability and immutability.

steps.description: Create various financial transactions including journal entries, sales invoices, and purchase orders
Retrieve the audit trail logs for each posted transaction
Verify audit logs contain timestamp, user details, transaction details, and immutable records
Ensure no manipulation or deletion of audit records is possible

title: Performance test with large dataset financial calculations
description: Verify system maintains high performance and deterministic calculations processing large volumes of accounting data including postings and reports.

steps.description: Generate and post several thousands of financial transactions and journal entries
Generate financial reports and trial balance from large data
Measure response time and verify system completes processing within acceptable thresholds
Verify calculations remain accurate and consistent despite large data volume

title: User configuration settings update and enforcement
description: Verify authorized users can update configuration settings and that changes apply correctly within the system.

steps.description: Login as user with configuration permissions
Navigate to the configuration/settings page
Modify settings such as tax rules, currency preferences, or account settings
Save the updated configuration
Verify changes are saved and applied across relevant modules
Confirm unauthorized users cannot access or alter these settings
